矤字的基本解释

矤
shěn
古同“矧”。

矤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shěn］
［《廣韻》式忍切，上軫，書。］
亦作“矤1”。
(1)况且；而况。
(2)亦。
(3)齿龈。
(4)指大笑。
(5)长，长度。

矤字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【矢字部】　矤； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页823第40
【說文】矧本字。从矢，引省聲。从矢，取詞之所之如矢也。　又長也。【揚子·方言】東齊曰矤，宋魯曰呂。　【玉篇】或作?。【廣韻】作訠。【字彙補】別作??，非。

矤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
矤字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
矤
shěn
Gu Tong is "矧".
矤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shěn]
["Guangyun"-style tolerant cut, Shang Zhen, book. ]
Also known as "矤1".
(1) Moreover; and the situation.
(2) Also.
(3) Gum.
(4) Refers to laughter.
(5) Long and long.
矤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Vector Characters] 　矤; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 823 40
【Said Wen】The original character. Cong the arrow, lead the province sound. From the arrow, the place of the word is like a arrow.　It's also long. 【Yangtze Dialect】Eastern Qi said 矤, Song Lu said Lu.　【Jade articles】Or make?. [Guang Yun] As a man. [Vocabulary Supplement] Don't make ??, no.
